articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell convicted of sex trafficking - INQUIRER.net
articles.description:
NEW YORK - British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell was found guilty on Wednesday of recruiting and grooming young girls to be sexually abused by the late American financier Jeffrey Epstein.

Maxwell

articles.title: Here’s what to know about CDC’s shorter COVID-19 isolation guidance - Global News
